description:
!!! ### *** TAB OVERHAUL *** ### !!!

Immense, major, significant, vast, massive fixes in E V E R Y single track. Added pitch perfect vocals AND backing vocals AND lyrics AND extra guitar track AND tambourine AND effects track to ensure that the tab is complete and all parts are present.
title: Noots

description: This is the last edit, i hope. In the song, three choruses, I'm inconsiderate. Also in the last bridge you need to remove the bar 102, 112 and the bars 129-132, as they are superfluous.
title: Noots

description: I forgot that there are two choruses in the song. In both of them the same mistake. So I changed the bars to more correct ones.
title: Noots

description: It is necessary to remove the two bar (153 and 154) in the last chorus and slightly change the notes, because they do not fall in rhythm with the song.
title: Noots
